price: Идите фараону и реците: 'Ми смо посланици Господара светова.
arabic: فَأۡتِيَا فِرۡعَوۡنَ فَقُولَآ إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fatiyā fir'ʿawna faqūlā innā rasūlu rabbi al-ʿālamīna
